verses.verse: Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about, <S%H3588>when<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> was <S%H2204>old,<s%> and his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> were <S%H4480>too<s%> <S%H3543>dim<s%> to <S%H7200>see,<s%> that he <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H1419>older<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "My <S%H1121>son.<s%>" And he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H2009>"Here<s%> I am."
And Isaac <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> I <S%H2204>am<s%> <S%H2204>old<s%> [and] I do not <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> of my <S%H4194>death.<s%>

<S%H6258>"Now<s%> then, <S%H4994>please<s%> <S%H5375>take<s%> your <S%H3627>gear,<s%> your <S%H8522>quiver<s%> and your <S%H7198>bow,<s%> and <S%H3318>go<s%> out to the <S%H7704>field<s%> and <S%H6679>hunt<s%> <S%H6718>game<s%> for me;

and <S%H6213>prepare<s%> a <S%H4303>savory<s%> <S%H4303>dish<s%> for me <S%H9201>such<s%> as I <S%H157>love,<s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> it to me that I may <S%H398>eat,<s%> <S%H5668>so<s%> that my <S%H5315>soul<s%> may <S%H1288>bless<s%> you <S%H2962>before<s%> I <S%H4191>die.<s%> "

And <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> was <S%H8085>listening<s%> while <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H6215>Esau.<s%> So when <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to the <S%H7704>field<s%> to <S%H6679>hunt<s%> for <S%H6718>game<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> [home,]

<S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to her <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I <S%H8085>heard<s%> your father <S%H1>speak<s%> to your <S%H1696>brother<s%> <S%H251>Esau,<s%> <S%H6215>saying,<s%>

<S%H935>'Bring<s%> me [some] <S%H6718>game<s%> and <S%H6213>prepare<s%> a <S%H4303>savory<s%> <S%H4303>dish<s%> for me, that I may <S%H398>eat,<s%> and <S%H1288>bless<s%> you in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> my <S%H4194>death.<s%>'
<S%H6258>"Now<s%> therefore, my <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H8085>listen<s%> to me as I <S%H6680>command<s%> you.

<S%H1980>"Go<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> to the <S%H6629>flock<s%> and <S%H3947>bring<s%> me <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2896>choice<s%> <S%H1423>kids<s%> <S%H5795><s%> from <S%H8033>there,<s%> that I may <S%H6213>prepare<s%> them [as] a <S%H4303>savory<s%> <S%H4303>dish<s%> for your father, <S%H1>such<s%> as he <S%H9201>loves.<s%>
"Then you shall <S%H935>bring<s%> [it] to your father, that he may <S%H1>eat,<s%> <S%H398>so<s%> that he may <S%H5668>bless<s%> you <S%H1288>before<s%> his <S%H6440>death.<s%>"

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%> his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H7259>Rebekah,<s%> <S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> my <S%H251>brother<s%> is a <S%H9617>hairy<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> and I am a <S%H2509>smooth<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%>

<S%H194>"Perhaps<s%> my father will <S%H1>feel<s%> me, then I shall be as a <S%H4959>deceiver<s%> in his <S%H8591>sight;<s%> and I shall <S%H5869>bring<s%> upon myself a <S%H935>curse<s%> and not a <S%H7045>blessing.<s%>"

But his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "Your <S%H7045>curse<s%> be on me, my <S%H1121>son;<s%> <S%H389>only<s%> <S%H8085>obey<s%> my <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H1980>go,<s%> <S%H3947>get<s%> [them] for me."

So he <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H3947>got<s%> [them,] and <S%H935>brought<s%> [them] to his <S%H517>mother;<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H4303>savory<s%> <S%H4303>food<s%> <S%H9201>such<s%> as his father <S%H1>loved.<s%>

Then <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H9143>best<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> her <S%H1419>elder<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were with her in the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H3847>put<s%> them on <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> her <S%H6996>younger<s%> <S%H1121>son.<s%>
And she <S%H3847>put<s%> the <S%H5785>skins<s%> of the <S%H1423>kids<s%> <S%H5795><s%> on his <S%H3027>hands<s%> and on the <S%H9142>smooth<s%> <S%H9142>part<s%> of his <S%H6677>neck.<s%>
She also <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H4303>savory<s%> <S%H4303>food<s%> and the <S%H3899>bread,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> she had <S%H6213>made,<s%> to her <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>
Then he <S%H935>came<s%> to his father and <S%H1>said,<s%> "My father." And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1>"Here<s%> I am. <S%H559>Who<s%> are you, my <S%H2009>son<s%>?"

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his father, "I am <S%H1>Esau<s%> your first-born; I have <S%H6215>done<s%> as you <S%H6213>told<s%> me. <S%H1696>Get<s%> up, <S%H6965>please,<s%> <S%H4994>sit<s%> and <S%H3427>eat<s%> of my <S%H398>game,<s%> that you may <S%H6718>bless<s%> me."

And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H4100>"How<s%> is it that you <S%H4672>have<s%> [it] so <S%H4116>quickly,<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%>?" And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3588>"Because<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> caused [it] to <S%H7136>happen<s%> to me."

Then <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H4994>"Please<s%> <S%H5066>come<s%> <S%H5066>close,<s%> that I may <S%H4184>feel<s%> you, my <S%H1121>son,<s%> whether you are <S%H2088>really<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> not."

So <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5066>came<s%> <S%H5066>close<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his father, and he <S%H1>felt<s%> him and <S%H4959>said,<s%> "The <S%H559>voice<s%> is the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H6963>Jacob,<s%> but the <S%H3290>hands<s%> are the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H3027>Esau.<s%>"
And he did not <S%H5234>recognize<s%> him, <S%H3588>because<s%> his <S%H3027>hands<s%> were <S%H9617>hairy<s%> like his <S%H251>brother<s%> Esau's <S%H3027>hands;<s%> so he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> him.
And he <S%H559>said,<s%> "Are you <S%H2088>really<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%>?" And he <S%H559>said,<s%> "I am."

So he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5066>"Bring<s%> [it] to me, and I will <S%H398>eat<s%> of my son's <S%H6718>game,<s%> that I may <S%H1288>bless<s%> you." And he <S%H5066>brought<s%> [it] to him, and he <S%H398>ate;<s%> he also <S%H935>brought<s%> him <S%H3196>wine<s%> and he <S%H8354>drank.<s%>
Then his father <S%H1>Isaac<s%> <S%H3327>said<s%> to him, <S%H559>"Please<s%> <S%H4994>come<s%> <S%H5066>close<s%> and <S%H5066>kiss<s%> me, my <S%H5401>son.<s%>"

So he <S%H5066>came<s%> <S%H5066>close<s%> and <S%H5401>kissed<s%> him; and when he <S%H9552>smelled<s%> the <S%H7381>smell<s%> of his <S%H899>garments,<s%> he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> him and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7200>"See,<s%> the <S%H7381>smell<s%> of my <S%H1121>son<s%> Is like the <S%H7381>smell<s%> of a <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H1288>blessed;<s%>

Now may <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> you of the <S%H2919>dew<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> And of the <S%H9614>fatness<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> And an <S%H7230>abundance<s%> of <S%H1715>grain<s%> and <S%H8492>new<s%> <S%H8492>wine;<s%>

May <S%H5971>peoples<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> you, And <S%H3816>nations<s%> <S%H7812>bow<s%> <S%H7812>down<s%> to you; Be <S%H1376>master<s%> of your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> And may your mother's <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H7812>bow<s%> <S%H7812>down<s%> to you. <S%H779>Cursed<s%> be those who <S%H779>curse<s%> you, And <S%H1288>blessed<s%> be those who <S%H1288>bless<s%> you."

Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about, as <S%H9201>soon<s%> as <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> had <S%H3615>finished<s%> <S%H1288>blessing<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> had <S%H389>hardly<s%> <S%H3318><s%> <S%H3318>gone<s%> out from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his father, that <S%H1>Esau<s%> his <S%H6215>brother<s%> <S%H251>came<s%> in from his <S%H935>hunting.<s%>

Then he <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H4303>savory<s%> <S%H4303>food,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> it to his father; and he <S%H1>said<s%> to his father, "Let my father <S%H559>arise,<s%> and <S%H1>eat<s%> of his son's <S%H1>game,<s%> that you may <S%H6965>bless<s%> me."
And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his father <S%H1>said<s%> to him, <S%H559>"Who<s%> are you?" And he <S%H4310>said,<s%> "I am your <S%H559>son,<s%> your first-born, <S%H1121>Esau.<s%>"

Then <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H2729>trembled<s%> <S%H2731>violently<s%> <S%H1419><s%><S%H5704>,<s%> <S%H3966><s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>"Who<s%> was he <S%H645>then<s%> that <S%H6679>hunted<s%> <S%H6718>game<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> [it] to me, so that I <S%H398>ate<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> [of it] <S%H2962>before<s%> you <S%H935>came,<s%> and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> him? <S%H1571>Yes,<s%> and he shall be <S%H1288>blessed.<s%>"

When <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of his father, he <S%H1>cried<s%> out with an <S%H6817>exceedingly<s%> <S%H3966>great<s%> and <S%H1419>bitter<s%> <S%H4751>cry,<s%> and <S%H6818>said<s%> to his father, <S%H559>"Bless<s%> me, [even] me <S%H1>also,<s%> O my father!"
And he <S%H559>said,<s%> "Your <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H4820>deceitfully,<s%> and has <S%H3947>taken<s%> away your <S%H1293>blessing.<s%>"

Then he <S%H559>said,<s%> "Is he not rightly <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> for he has <S%H6117>supplanted<s%> me <S%H2088>these<s%> <S%H6471>two<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%>? He <S%H3947>took<s%> away my <S%H1062>birthright,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> he has <S%H3947>taken<s%> away my <S%H1293>blessing.<s%>" And he <S%H559>said,<s%> "Have you not <S%H680>reserved<s%> a <S%H1293>blessing<s%> for me?"

But <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> <S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> I have <S%H7760>made<s%> him your <S%H1376>master,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H251>relatives<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> to him as <S%H5650>servants;<s%> and with <S%H1715>grain<s%> and <S%H8492>new<s%> <S%H8492>wine<s%> I have <S%H5564>sustained<s%> him. Now as for you <S%H645>then,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> can I <S%H6213>do,<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%>?"

And <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his father, "Do you have only <S%H1>one<s%> <S%H259>blessing,<s%> my father? <S%H1293>Bless<s%> me, [even] me <S%H1>also,<s%> O my father." So <S%H1288>Esau<s%> <S%H1571>lifted<s%> his <S%H1>voice<s%> and <S%H6215>wept.<s%>

Then <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his father <S%H1>answered<s%> and <S%H6030>said<s%> to him, <S%H559>"Behold,<s%> away from the <S%H2009>fertility<s%> of the <S%H9614>earth<s%> shall be your <S%H776>dwelling,<s%> And away from the <S%H4186>dew<s%> of <S%H2919>heaven<s%> from <S%H8064>above.<s%>

"And by your <S%H2719>sword<s%> you shall <S%H2421>live,<s%> And your <S%H251>brother<s%> you shall <S%H5647>serve;<s%> But it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> about <S%H9201>when<s%> you <S%H7300>become<s%> <S%H7300>restless,<s%> That you shall <S%H6561>break<s%> his <S%H5923>yoke<s%> from your <S%H6677>neck.<s%>"

So <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H7852>bore<s%> a <S%H7852>grudge<s%> <S%H7852>against<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> his father had <S%H1>blessed<s%> him; and <S%H1288>Esau<s%> <S%H6215>said<s%> to <S%H559>himself,<s%> "The <S%H3820>days<s%> of <S%H3117>mourning<s%> for my father are <S%H60>near;<s%> then I will <S%H1>kill<s%> my <S%H7126>brother<s%> <S%H2026>Jacob.<s%>"

Now when the <S%H1697>words<s%> of her <S%H1419>elder<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> were <S%H5046>reported<s%> to <S%H7259>Rebekah,<s%> she <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> her <S%H6996>younger<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H2009>"Behold<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> is <S%H5162>consoling<s%> himself concerning you, [by planning] to <S%H2026>kill<s%> you.

<S%H6258>"Now<s%> therefore, my <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H8085>obey<s%> my <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H6965>arise,<s%> <S%H1272>flee<s%> to <S%H2771>Haran,<s%> to my <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H3837>Laban!<s%>
"And <S%H3427>stay<s%> with him a <S%H259>few<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H834><s%> your brother's <S%H2534>fury<s%> <S%H7725>subsides,<s%>

<S%H5704>until<s%> your brother's <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H4480>against<s%> you <S%H7725>subsides,<s%> and he <S%H7911>forgets<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> you <S%H6213>did<s%> to him. Then I shall <S%H7971>send<s%> and <S%H3947>get<s%> you from <S%H8033>there.<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> should I be <S%H7921>bereaved<s%> of you <S%H8147>both<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>? "

And <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> "I am <S%H6973>tired<s%> of <S%H9132>living<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth;<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H3947>takes<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> from the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth,<s%> like <S%H428>these,<s%> from the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> good will my <S%H9132>life<s%> be to me?"
